alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 11:42AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LAPEER AND NORTHEASTERN GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EST... At 1142 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mount Morris, or near Clio, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Flint, Lapeer, Davison, Imlay City, Clio, Brown City, North Branch, Columbiaville, Burton, Mount Morris, Otisville, Otter Lake, Lum, Beecher, Crossroads Village, Genesee, Attica, Burnside, Elba, and Goodland Township. This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 123 and 133. I-475 between mile markers 10 and 16. I-69 between mile markers 152 and 154, and near mile marker 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
